lyn9.name: Lyn
lyn9.title: Of Blazing
lyn9.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to Elyos. Resides in the Ring of the Lady of the Plains. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade / Fire Emblem Engage.
lyn9.duo:
Expand
Collapse
]
Enhanced Engaged Special
When Special triggers, boosts damage by unit's max Special cooldown count value × 4 (excluding area-of-effect Specials).
Unit can use the following【Style】:
――――― Emblem Lyn Style ―――――
Unit can attack foes within 5 spaces of unit and 3 rows or 3 columns centered on unit regardless of unit's range. Unit suffers a counterattack if any of the following conditions are met: foe is armored with Range = 2, foe can counterattack regardless of unit's range, foe's Range is the same as the distance between unit and the foe.
Unit cannot move or attack structures, after-combat movement effects do not occur, unit's area-of-effect Specials cannot be triggered, and remaining movement granted from Canto is treated as 0. Skill effect's Range is treated as 2, including by skill effects determined by attack Range, like Pavise and Aegis. This Style can be used only when unit's Range = 2, cannot be used on the first turn, and once used, cannot be used for two turns.
――――――――――――――――――――
【Style】
Change Style using the Style button at the bottom of the screen.
A unit's Style is only active when that unit is taking an action. When unit is equipped with a skill that has a Style, unit will not be able to use skills like Duo Skills or Harmonized Skills. Style use is disabled when unit is deployed using Pair Up or when unit is equipped with multiple skills that have a Style.

Castle Hall: It's hard to believe I will see friends who accompanied me in Elibe. They may be surprised that I'm an Emblem.
In Elyos, I was very precious to the king of Elusia. Though, he has passed...
Both Elyos and Sacae had places with wide-open, emerald plains... I can imagine a place like that here.
If I have the ability to eat in Askr, then I wonder if I can change clothes too... I suppose I should ask the other Lyns.
Engage with me and you can send an arrow a great distance, and even hit a scrap of paper dangling from a tree.
Visit:
This is from [F].
I thought I'd send it with Astra Storm, but I wanted to meet you in person.
Level: It seems the wind is assisting us. Now is a good time to make a move.
The wind is in our favor. Let's keep this pace.
When the wind blows against you, it is time to push harder.
Summon: I am Lyn, the Emblem. I can feel a familiar wind here... Let us fight together.
Learn Skill: I will meet all your expectations. You will know both victory and renewal.
Confession:
I see you are looking up at the night sky with that gentle gaze, [S]...
Perhaps you are hoping to catch sight of a shooting star that allows you to summon Hero after Hero?
*chuckle* That is one reason to appreciate a starry night sky. Though, I do hope you aren't too cold...
I don't mind the cold myself. In Elyos, I was entrusted to a snowy land.
As an Emblem, I appreciate both grassy plains as well as vast expanses of snow.
I have fond memories of the cold wind that swept across such lands.
Should you grow tired of waiting for this star, I will lend my ear. Entrust me with your problems, anytime.
Status: A familiar wind... It brings back memories of Elyos and my homeland of Sacae.
Ahhh! Don't poke around thoughtlessly. Do the blue flames interest you?
Where are Ivy and Hortensia? I should stay nearby to protect them.
Polish the ring up and make it sparkle... Oh, right, my ring isn't here!
Sweep across, Emblem of Blazing... Remember those words. They are the invocation to summon me.
*chuckle* It's nice that both Eliwood and Hector look well.
I am different from the Lyns who have come before me, but I am quite strong. I will show you the true power of an Emblem!
